Mondstrahl joined #xwiki at 09:43  
Mondstrahl - (31/05/2009 09:43): Anyone up ?  
arunreddy\_ joined #xwiki at 09:44  
Mondstrahl - (31/05/2009 09:45): Hi  
asyd - (31/05/2009 09:46): hi  
Mondstrahl - (31/05/2009 09:47): Are you into xwiki a lot ?  
tharindu\_\_ joined #xwiki at 09:47  
Mondstrahl - (31/05/2009 09:47): Hi  
Mondstrahl - (31/05/2009 09:47): My usergroups are messed up  
Mondstrahl - (31/05/2009 09:47): and the users 2  
arunreddy\_\_ left at 09:50 (Read error: 113 (No route to host))  
sdumitriu - (31/05/2009 09:51): Hi Mondstrahl  
sdumitriu - (31/05/2009 09:51): What's wrong?  
Mondstrahl - (31/05/2009 09:53): Hi  
Mondstrahl - (31/05/2009 09:53): I simply edited some pages an then the usergrp and user admin does not show any users nor groups  
Mondstrahl - (31/05/2009 09:53): anymore =/  
sdumitriu - (31/05/2009 09:54): Try cleaning the browser cache first  
Mondstrahl - (31/05/2009 09:54): I did - but i try again  
sdumitriu - (31/05/2009 09:54): Oh, are you browsing in german?  
Mondstrahl - (31/05/2009 09:55): and the form looks a little defect - but not too much - some lines missing.  
Mondstrahl - (31/05/2009 09:55): the grp and user form  
Mondstrahl - (31/05/2009 09:55): i even tried iexplorer  
Mondstrahl - (31/05/2009 09:56): ja deutsch ginge auch  
Mondstrahl - (31/05/2009 09:56): Yes - browsing in german  
sdumitriu - (31/05/2009 09:57): K, there's a bug which will be solved in 1.9RC2  
sdumitriu - (31/05/2009 09:57): Let me find the email  
Mondstrahl - (31/05/2009 09:57): oh - thanks  
sdumitriu - (31/05/2009 09:58): http://markmail.org/message/dvh6o4o6rqvusjjf  
Mondstrahl - (31/05/2009 10:01): Thank you so much =)  
Mondstrahl - (31/05/2009 10:01): Thats what it has been  
Mondstrahl - (31/05/2009 10:01): what irc client can you suggest  
sdumitriu - (31/05/2009 10:02): I use pidgin  
Mondstrahl - (31/05/2009 10:02): ok  
Mondstrahl - (31/05/2009 10:03): Can Pidgin handle skype ?  
Mondstrahl - (31/05/2009 10:03): I mean - without having skype installed and incl cam, voice .chat.... ?  
sdumitriu - (31/05/2009 10:03): I think there is a plugin, but just for chat, no audio  
Mondstrahl - (31/05/2009 10:03): ok - i thought so
